001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.encoder;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.ElapsedTime;
006import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.EncodedMotor;
007import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.Sensor;
008
009/**
010 * Wraps a motor instance to provide corrected velocity counts and allow reversing independently of the corresponding
011 * slot's motor direction
012 */
013public class MotorEncoder extends Sensor<DcMotorEx> implements Encoder {
014
015    private static final int CPS_STEP = 0x10000;
016    public int offset = 0;
017
018    private int curPos;
019    private int rawPos;
020    private double curVel;
021    private double rawVel;
022    private double corVel;
023
024    private static double inverseOverflow(double input, double estimate) {
025        double real = input;
026        while (Math.abs(estimate - real) > CPS_STEP / 2.0) {
027            real += Math.signum(estimate - real) * CPS_STEP;
028        }
029        return real;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public double getSensorValue() {
034        return getCurrentPosition();
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public void zeroEncoder() {
039        offset = motor.getCurrentPosition();
040    }
041
042    public enum Direction {
043        FORWARD(1),
044        REVERSE(-1);
045
046        private int multiplier;
047
048        Direction(int multiplier) {
049            this.multiplier = multiplier;
050        }
051
052        public int getMultiplier() {
053            return multiplier;
054        }
055    }
056
057    private DcMotorEx motor;
058    private ElapsedTime clock;
059
060    private Direction direction;
061
062    private int lastPosition;
063    private double velocityEstimate;
064    private double lastUpdateTime;
065
066    public MotorEncoder(DcMotorEx motor, ElapsedTime clock, String nm) {
067        super(motor, nm);
068        // motor.setMode(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER);
069        this.motor = motor;
070        this.clock = clock;
071        clock.reset();
072
073        this.direction = Direction.FORWARD;
074
075        this.lastPosition = 0;
076        this.velocityEstimate = 0.0;
077        this.lastUpdateTime = clock.seconds();
078    }
079
080    public MotorEncoder(DcMotorEx motor, String nm) {
081        this(motor, new ElapsedTime(), nm);
082    }
083
084    public MotorEncoder(String deviceName) {
085        this(hardwareMap.get(DcMotorEx.class, deviceName), deviceName);
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public String LogLine() {
090        return logData(
091            String.format("%d (Raw: %d), Vel %f1.3 (Raw: %f1.3, Cor: %f1.)", curPos, rawPos, curVel, rawVel, corVel)
092        );
093    }
094
095    public Direction getDirection() {
096        return direction;
097    }
098
099    private int getMultiplier() {
100        return (getDirection().getMultiplier() * (motor.getDirection() == DcMotorSimple.Direction.FORWARD ? 1 : -1));
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Allows you to set the direction of the counts and velocity without modifying the motor's direction state
105     * @param direction either reverse or forward depending on if encoder counts should be negated
106     */
107    public void setDirection(Direction direction) {
108        this.direction = direction;
109    }
110
111    public MotorEncoder invert() {
112        setDirection(getDirection() == Direction.FORWARD ? Direction.REVERSE : Direction.FORWARD);
113        return this;
114    }
115
116    public int getCurrentPosition() {
117        int multiplier = getMultiplier();
118        rawPos = motor.getCurrentPosition();
119        curPos = (rawPos - offset) * multiplier;
120        if (curPos != lastPosition) {
121            double currentTime = clock.seconds();
122            double dt = currentTime - lastUpdateTime;
123            velocityEstimate = (curPos - lastPosition) / dt;
124            lastPosition = curPos;
125            lastUpdateTime = currentTime;
126        }
127        return curPos;
128    }
129
130    public double getRawVelocity() {
131        int multiplier = getMultiplier();
132        rawVel = motor.getVelocity();
133        curVel = rawVel * multiplier;
134        return curVel;
135    }
136
137    public double getCorrectedVelocity() {
138        corVel = inverseOverflow(getRawVelocity(), velocityEstimate);
139        return corVel;
140    }
141}
